snippet.title: Timelie: Hell Loop - DLC Trailer
snippet.description:
Fresh off of it's "Game of the Year '' award at the Bangkok International Digital Content Festival 2020, the hit time-manipulation puzzle game, Timelie, is back with a vengeance. 

Thought the original game was too hard? Take a journey through "Hell Loop," the game's first official DLC that includes over 30 new levels designed to push the game's unique mechanics to the level and your brain to the breaking point. Do you have what it takes to make it through "Hell Loop"?

Hell Loop will be available on October 9, 2020.

=====================================

Hall of the Mountain King by Kevin MacLeod http://incompetech.com 
Creative Commons — Attribution 4.0 International — CC BY 4.0 
Free Download / Stream: https://bit.ly/hall-of-the-mountain-king
Music promoted by Audio Library https://youtu.be/2RDX5sVEfs4
